attributes.description: Only At Action Ford Roodepoort, 93 William Nicole Drive Constantia. We only sell quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles goes through a 160 point check, all with a full service history. All our vehicles are Accedent free (No structural damage). Most of our vehicles have standard  warranties and if the vehicle is out of warranty we can provide you with a warranty at a cost. We always strive to give good customer service.

attributes.title: 2016 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Sahara 3.6 V6 Auto

attributes.description: Vehicle comes with balance of the 4yr / 60 000km factory service plan and balance of the 4yr / 120 000km factory warranty. NMG Cape Town Quality Guarantee: As a standard included in your Service & Delivery Fee, all of our vehicles go for a full 160 Point Workshop Check as well as a roadworthy test to ensure that the vehicle is mechanically sound. We will attend to any minor dents or scratches to the exterior of the vehicle should there be any. A full interior valet & exterior polish is performed on each of our pre-owned vehicles at point of sale. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted on to your finance. A variety of finance options available, tailor made to suite your pocket. Trade Ins are welcome! **Service & Delivery Fee not included in the advertised price.

This Haval H1 1.5 is a must have! The vehicle has exceptionally low mileage, it is light on fuel and it has been kept in fantastic condition. The vehicle comes with a host of extras, such as:

-Rear PDC
-Electric Mirrors
-Electric Windows
-USB Port
-Aux Port
-Bluetooth
-Cruise Control
-Multi Function Steering Wheel
-Climate Control
-CD Player
